original_text: And they of Bethshemesh were reaping their wheat harvest in the valley: and they lifted up their eyes, and saw the ark, and rejoiced to see it.
korean_text: 벧세메스 사람들이 골짜기에서 밀을 베다가 눈을 들어 궤를 보고 그 본 것을 기뻐하더니

sentences.original_text: And they of Bethshemesh were reaping
their wheat harvest in the valley:
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 골짜기에서 밀 추수를 하고 있었다

sentences.original_text: and they lifted up their eyes,
